examples.example: 这是一桩非常有意义的事情，值得我们全力以赴去完成。

translate.english: This is a very meaningful thing and worthy of our all-out efforts to complete.

examples.example: 他做成了一桩了不起的大买卖，大家都为他感到高兴。

translate.english: He made a remarkable big deal, and everyone was happy for him.

examples.example: 他做了一桩好事，帮助了那位迷路的老人找到了回家的路。

translate.english: He did a good deed and helped the lost old man find his way home.
